items.title: Volkswagen CFO delivers broadside to unproductive workers as China emerges as a potential buyer of factories
items.description: Volkswagen CFO Arno Antlitz said the carmaker wouldn't invest in unproductive factories, paving way for new battle with workers.

items.title: Biden uses farewell address to warn an ultra-wealthy ‘oligarchy’ and a ‘tech-industrial complex’ are infringing on Americans’ rights
items.description: Biden seized what is likely to be his final opportunity to address the country before he departs the White House to spotlight the accumulation of powe...

items.title: Brad Pitt slams ‘awful’ AI scammers who faked relationship to convince French woman to send them $855,000
items.description: A French women was duped out of $855,000 by an AI-generated Brad Pitt. Now, the actor is warning fans not to respond to unsolicited online outreach.

items.title: Former UBS director says FIRE isn’t worth it because ‘you’ll get bored very quickly’
items.description: Eric Sim, formerly a managing director at UBS, said people working doggedly towards retirement without knowing what they'll do with their new-found fr...

items.title: Cartier owner Richemont shines with better-than-expected sales as poor China demand offset by rest of the world
items.description: Despite weakness in China, "Richemont has never been stronger," investment firm Vontobel's analyst said.
